articles.title: Passenger's phone catches fire mid-air on IndiGo's Assam-Delhi flight - India Today
articles.description: A passenger's mobile phone caught fire mid-air on an IndiGo flight on Thursday. The flight was heading to Delhi from Assam's Dibrugarh when a cabin crew member saw smoke emitting from a passenger's phone.
